thread.title: Kuznetsova Takes the Kremlin Cup
thread.title_full: Kuznetsova Takes the Kremlin Cup - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Kuznetsova Takes the Kremlin Cup
text:
Svetlana Kuznetsova swept aside a tired Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova, 6-2, 6-1, to win the Kremlin Cup in Moscow. Kuznetsova dominated throughout against a fellow Russian who acknowledged being exhausted as she played her 10th match in 12 days.
■ The defending champion Tomas Berdych advanced to the Stockholm Open final when Marcos Baghdatis withdrew from their semifinal because of injury trailing by a set. In Sunday’s final, Berdych will play Jack Sock, who defeated Richard Gasquet, 6-4, 6-2. (REUTERS)
■ David Ferrer beat Gaël Monfils, 7-6 (5), 7-5, at the Erste Bank Open in Vienna. Ferrer will play Steve Johnson for the title. Johnson beat Ernests Gulbis, 6-3, 7-6 (4), to advance to his first ATP final.
